title: Min vengtu chu Lalpa a ni
lyrics:
Min vengtu chu Lalpa a ni,
Tlachhamin ka awm lo vang;
A thatna dang chuang ngai lo kha,
Chatuan ka ta a lo ni.
Chawlhna tui kamah min hruaiin,
Ka nunna min siam that thin;
Hnim tui tinreng min kawhhmuhin,
Ka thlarau pawh a chawm thin.
Thihna hlim kawr kal mah ila,
Engmah ka hlau tawp lo vang;
Nang ka kiangah i awm vangin,
Muang takinn ka awm fo thin.
Min dotu laka min humin,
Ei tur min lo buatsaih thin;
Aw, lawmna famkim pek min tiam,
Malsawm tinrengin ka liam.
I thatna leh ngilneihnain,
Dam chhungin min zui zel ang;
Berampui tha, ka fak ang che,
Nangma biakbuk chhung ngeiah.

Thluk 2 na
Min vengtu chu Lalpa a ni,
Thlachhamin ka awm lo'ng;
A thatna dang chuang ngai lo kha,
Chatuan ka ta a ni.
Chawlhna tui kamah min hruaiin,
Ka nun min siam that thin:
Hnim tui tinreng min khawhhmuhin,
Ka thlarau a a chawm thin.
Thihna hlim kawr kal mah ila,
Eng mah ka hlau lo vang;
Nang ka kiangah i awm vangin,
Muang takin ka awm thin.
Min dotu laka min humin,
Ei tur min buatsaih thin;
Aw, lawmna famkim pek min tiam,
Malsawm tinreng ka liam.
I thatna leh ngilhneihnain,
Dam chhungin min zui ang;
Berampu tha, ka fak ang che,
Nangma biakbuk ngeiah.
